channel.title: Hospital on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Hospital on Game6r

item.title: My Dream Hospital
item.description: The game Hospital will turn you into a real doctor who knows a lot about complex operations. And the patient will be the boy Egor, who was born with a weak heart. Because of this, he cannot live a full life and often gets tired. Therefore, it is necessary to carry out an operation that will help the little boy cope with the problem. The hospital will provide you with all the necessary tools to use during the treatment process.

item.title: Princess Ava Real Dentist
item.description: During the game Hospital Operation for Girls you will play the role of a surgeon. A patient was brought to your clinic with certain brain problems. The task is to carry out all the necessary procedures and help the girl cope with such a serious problem. The hospital has already prepared the tools that will be useful for the operation, and it remains only to use them correctly. This will help detailed tips from the head nurse, who will accompany you throughout the process.
